level.heading: Cost-of-construction adjustment for the Fund attributable to Office of Public Education Facilities Modernization capital budgets.
Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: For temporary (90 day) repeal of section, see § 4042(a) of Fiscal Year 2008 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2007 (D.C. Act 17-74, July 25, 2007, 54 DCR 7549).

level.heading: Miscellaneous Notes
level.text: Short title: Section 4041 of D.C. Law 17-20 provided that subtitle E of title IV of the act may be cited as the "Public Education Reform Conforming Amendments Act of 2007".
